strings: <voice_0x01000FD3><se_low>The Seer: Ah! If it isn't the people I met at the spring! Well, well! Well, well, well... Well... Let me see... Hm? Can I help you with something?

<voice_0x01000FD4><se_low>The Seer: What!? But the magic mirror is a royal heirloom!
And you say King Clavius gave it to you!?
Well, well! Let me examine it, then!

<voice_0x01000FD5><se_low>The Seer: Yes! This is it! The sun mirror!
A quite unmistakable feel it has.
I'll never forget the first time I touched it
in Argonia.

<voice_0x01000FD6><se_low>The Seer: But...hmm... Yes... Most curious...
It's lost all of its magic.

<voice_0x01000FD7><se_low>The Seer: Oh, dear! I'm not being very clear, am I?
You see, this mirror that you call the magic mirror is really called the sun mirror.
<voice_0x01000FD8><se_low>The Seer: But now that all its magic has been lost, you can't very well call it a magic mirror any more...
<voice_0x01000FD9><se_low>Yangus: There was a bloke in the castle who said the same thing. That's why we're 'ere to see ya. Thought ya could give us some assistation.
<voice_0x01000FDA><se_def>Angelo: The scholar we spoke to in Argonia said you might know how to restore its magic.

<voice_0x01000FDB><se_high>Jessica: That's why we've come to see you.
Being so wise and everything, we thought you could tell us how to get its magic back.
<voice_0x01000FDC><se_low>King Trode: Quite right, old man! But we need this mirror's power! It's imperative we find a way...
<voice_0x01000FDD><se_low>The Seer: Hm... A way to get magic back into the mirror...? Yes...
<voice_0x01000FDE><se_low>The Seer: I remember hearing long ago about a spell of blinding light that was cast on the sun mirror. That's what gave it such tremendous brilliance.
<voice_0x01000FDF><se_low>The Seer: If the mirror has lost that magic now... Hm...
<voice_0x01000FE0><se_low>The Seer: Perhaps casting the same spell could restore its magical properties.

<voice_0x01000FE1><se_low>The Seer: The problem is...I can't remember what the spell was... A spell that casts a blinding light...
Hm, what a conundrum...

<voice_0x01000FE2><se_low>The Seer: Ah! Of course!
The sea dragon's spell!
<voice_0x01000FE3><se_low>The Seer: Just north of this land you will find a stone arch bridging the straits. A sailor once told me of a giant sea dragon in the waters there.
<voice_0x01000FE4><se_low>The Seer: He said it cast a spell on him that left him blinded for a few moments.
<voice_0x01000FE5><se_low>The Seer: I suppose it's possible a bright light such as that could restore the magic to the mirror.

<voice_0x01000FE6><se_low>The Seer: You never know, it might just work. Try using the mirror to reflect the sea dragon's spell!
Aha, good luck!
